name: emoji_tester
description: Want to see how a browser is going to render something, by codepoint? ... here ya go

scripts.clean: rimraf docs && mkdir docs && rimraf build && mkdir build && cd build && mkdir typescript && mkdir rollup && mkdir uglify && cd .. && cd src && cd ts && rimraf generated_code && mkdir generated_code && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run site && npm run write_version && npm run typescript

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
